context_of_use: This use case allows planners to calculate and review various impacts of proposed mobility measures or events.
stakeholders_and_interests: Planner: to validate urban mobility proposals and assess their impacts
description: Calculate and review cost, emissions, noise levels, and sensor-based traffic metrics for proposed mobility measures or events.
triggering_event: The planner initiates the estimation process for a proposed measure.
preconditions: The planner has access to the urban mobility planning system.
Proposed measures or events are defined.
postconditions: The estimated cost, emissions, noise levels, and traffic metrics are calculated and available for review.
assumptions: The system has access to relevant data for cost, emissions, noise levels, and traffic metrics.
requirements_met: The system shall provide an estimation of the cost of a measure.
The system shall provide an estimation of congestion emissions.
The system shall provide an estimation of traffic noise levels.
The system shall allow review of emission levels at pollution sensors.
The system shall allow review of traffic levels at traffic sensors.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the data sources for cost, emissions, and noise level estimations.
main_flow: 1. Planner → The system retrieves data for the proposed measure.
2. Planner → The system calculates the estimated cost of the measure.
3. Planner → The system calculates the estimated congestion emissions.
4. Planner → The system calculates the estimated traffic noise levels.
5. Planner → The system retrieves emission levels from pollution sensors.
6. Planner → The system retrieves traffic levels from traffic sensors.
7. Planner → The system presents the calculated estimates and sensor data for review.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 2): If the cost estimation fails, the system notifies the planner and allows for re-entry of measure data.
AF-2 (from Step 3): If the emission estimation fails, the system notifies the planner and allows for re-entry of measure data.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the system cannot retrieve data for the proposed measure, it alerts the planner and terminates the process.
